item.title: Procedura di valutazione comparativa per il conferimento mediante affidamento, ovvero mediante contratto di diritto privato, degli insegnamenti del Master II livello in “Supervisore interventi riabilitativi nell’autismo: ABA e tecnologie robotiche”
BANDO NETWORK INTERMATHS 2024
item.description:
Bando per l’ammissione ai percorsi formativi internazionali delle lauree magistrali in Ingegneria Matematica e Modellistica Matematica e per la formazione di una graduatoria per l’assegnazione delle borse di studio del progetto Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degrees InterMaths – coorte 2024.

From: 10-11-2023 13:00
To: 17-06-2024 13:00
Category: Bandi di mobilità

Call for Applications - InterMaths Network


  • Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree “InterMaths - Interdisciplinary Mathematics” 

  • Double Master Degree “RealMaths - Mathematics for Real World Applications” 

  • Joint Master Degree “Mathmods - Mathematical Modelling in Engineering” 

For practical reasons, by filling out this form you are applying for all said three programmes. However, in the form, you will be asked to express your level of interest in each of them.


When you sign up, pay special attention to:


  1. Name and Surname: Enter your name as it appears on your international passport. If you have a middle name, then include that as well in the "name" field.

  2. Phone number: follow this example +49 019876543 (i.e., country code + blank space + phone number without any spaces).

  3. Permanent address: Enter your permanent home address, not one where you live temporarily (e.g. campus, dormitory, office, PO boxes etc.).

For more guidelines and screenshots, see here: [link]
